results.name: Number of irreducible factors in the factorization of X^n + 1 over GF(2) (counted with multiplicity).
link: Robert Israel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
A. Karttunen, Scheme-program for computing this sequence.
Index entries for sequences operating on GF(2)[X]-polynomials
maple: h:= proc(n) option remember;  numtheory:-phi(n)/numtheory:-order(2,n/2^padic:-ordp(n,2)) end proc:
xref: Cf. A000374 gives the number of distinct irreducible factors of the same polynomials.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Jan 03 2004
